  3. AI Systems in Production

Ship AI features that respect latency, privacy, and human oversight.

AI Systems in Production

Covers retrieval, evaluation, and safe deployment patterns with hands-on Python snippets.

aimlopsevaluation1 min read

Guiding principles

  • Treat models like dependencies: version, verify, and roll them back.
  • Separate retrieval from reasoning so you can swap LLM providers without touching business logic.
  • Instrument prompts like code: capture latency, token usage, and drift against golden test sets.

Safety first

Align with the CIA triad: confidentiality (PII scrubbing), integrity (input validation and signed outputs), availability (rate protection and graceful degradation).

Hands-on

  • Build a retrieval chain that caches embeddings locally for reproducibility.
  • Add lightweight red-teaming prompts to your CI so regressions are caught before deploy.
  • Use the Python cell below to experiment with token budgets and latency.
Python (Runno · WASM)

Runs entirely in your browser for fast, isolated experiments.
